name: The Diary
description:
Originally created for Jayisgames' One-Room Interactive Fiction Competition in 2009 this is a one-room game of interactive fiction in Z-code that incorporates the theme: "escape".

In this Lovecraftian horror you play an author trapped in his study with a lurking beast trying to find him. Find how you can escape what seems inevitable doom in one of multiple endings.

Support this game (even for $0) to get notified on updates and changes.

Last Updated: 16 May 2016
